channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: The Mother Flip
channel.desc: Kristy and Rebecca hike up their favorite nature trail to get a bird's eye view of a potential flip in the upscale community of Wimberley, Texas, which is known in the Hill Country for its big city wealth and small-town charm. The comps are great, but the bombardment of pink along with dated finishes and 1.5-acre lot pose unique challenges for the team to make big changes while staying under budget to attract niche buyers who are looking for their forever home.
